message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm looking for a price around $16,000 to let it go. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $16,000 is my ideal price point, I understand you're working with a budget. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $11,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
